scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection contains one letter, ALS, 2p., dated 1868 Oct 12, Bayard Taylor, Kennett Square, to B.B. Wade, Brooklyn, New York. Taylor, an American journalist and author, hopes to have time to meet with him for literary discussion before he sails, but has just returned home from Europe and must prepare for his parents 50th Anniversay. With envelope.
